page.title: 06RIPPONDEN BANK
page.content: In the centre of the village the houses are mainly old and built of stone. On the outskirts, new houses have been built and these are made of brick and Marshalite. There are two shops up Ripponden Bank, a plumber and an elecrical repair shop. There is also a branch of the Halifax Building Society and an accountant's. Other important buildings in the Ripponden Bank Area:{ {Victoria Hall}used as a Youth Club and a Conservative Club. {Pennine Farm Museum}open on weekends and Bank Holidays, admission 5p children, 10p adults. {Library}open Mon., Tues., Thurs., Fri. and Sat.. { {Health Centre-}for Doctors' Surgeries. {Health Spa}a private club used for weight training, aerobics, saunas, sunbeds and as a spa bath.
